languages.text: "Вы пошли на поводу у неблагонадежного сброда. Поверили в их россказни и дали поблажки. В следующий раз, когда на корабль нападут культисты — они откроют им все шлюзы и позволят устроить любые диверсии, потому что не видят в вас власти".

"You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."
languages.original_text: "Вы пошли на поводу у неблагонадежного сброда. Поверили в их россказни и дали поблажки. В следующий раз, когда на корабль нападут культисты — они откроют им все шлюзы и позволят устроить любые диверсии, потому что не видят в вас власти".

traits.locale_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by pirates, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

"You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by pirates, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

"You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by pirates, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

"You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

languages.text: “您对那些心怀不轨的乌合之众卑躬屈膝。您相信了他们的谎言，以宽宏大量的态度处理了他们。等您的船下次被异端分子袭击时，那群乌合之众便会张开双臂欢迎入侵者，允许他们肆意破坏，因为他们认为您是个软弱的领袖。”
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: “您对那些心怀不轨的乌合之众卑躬屈膝。您相信了他们的谎言，以宽宏大量的态度处理了他们。等您的船下次被海盗袭击时，那群乌合之众便会张开双臂欢迎入侵者，允许他们肆意破坏，因为他们认为您是个软弱的领袖。”

languages.text: «Se ha doblegado ante una turba desleal. Ha creído sus mentiras y les ha otorgado indulgencia. La próxima vez que nos ataquen los cultistas, esa caterva los recibirá con los brazos abiertos y les permitirá sembrar todo el caos que deseen, porque ahora {mf|le|la} considerarán un{mf||a} líder débil».
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha doblegado ante una turba desleal. Ha creído sus mentiras y les ha otorgado indulgencia. La próxima vez que nos ataquen los piratas, esa caterva los recibirá con los brazos abiertos y les permitirá sembrar todo el caos que deseen, porque ahora {mf|le|la} considerarán un{mf||a} líder débil».

languages.text: 「あなたは不誠実な暴徒たちに屈服した。あなたは彼らの嘘を信じ、寛大な態度を示した。今度、船が魔女団に襲われたら、あの連中は海賊を手放しで歓迎し、好きなように大混乱を起こすのを許すでしょう。彼らはあなたを弱い指導者と見ているからです」
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは不誠実な暴徒たちに屈服した。あなたは彼らの嘘を信じ、寛大な態度を示した。今度、船が海賊に襲われたら、あの連中は海賊を手放しで歓迎し、好きなように大混乱を起こすのを許すでしょう。彼らはあなたを弱い指導者と見ているからです」

languages.text: "Ihr habt vor dem untreuen Pöbel gebuckelt. Ihr habt ihre Lügen geglaubt und ihnen Gnade gewährt. Wenn das Schiff das nächste Mal von Kultisten angegriffen wird, wird dieser Pöbel sie mit offenen Armen empfangen und ihnen gestatten, so viel Schaden anzurichten, wie sie möchten. Weil sie euch nun als {mf|schwachen Anführer|schwache Anführerin} ansehen."
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt vor dem untreuen Pöbel gebuckelt. Ihr habt ihre Lügen geglaubt und ihnen Gnade gewährt. Wenn das Schiff das nächste Mal von Piraten angegriffen wird, wird dieser Pöbel sie mit offenen Armen empfangen und ihnen gestattet, so viel Schaden anzurichten, wie sie möchten. Weil sie euch nun als {mf|schwachen Anführer|schwache Anführerin} ansehen."

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|écrasé|écrasée} devant un ramassis de rebelles sans aveu. Vous avez cru à leurs mensonges et fait preuve d'un laxisme coupable. La prochaine fois que des cultistes attaqueront le vaisseau, ces misérables les accueilleront à bras ouverts et les laisseront semer le chaos comme bon leur semble, pour la simple raison que vous n'aurez pas su asseoir votre autorité. »
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes {mf|écrasé|écrasée} devant un ramassis de rebelles sans aveu. Vous avez cru à leurs mensonges et fait preuve d'un laxisme coupable. La prochaine fois que des pirates attaqueront le vaisseau, ces misérables les accueilleront à bras ouverts et les laisseront semer le chaos comme bon leur semble, pour la simple raison que vous n'aurez pas su asseoir votre autorité. »

languages.text: "Hainlerin laflarına kandınız. Yalanlarına inanıp onlara müsamaha gösterdiniz. Tarikatçılar gemiye tekrar saldırdığında onlara kucak açacak, sizi zayıf gördükleri için tarikatçıların dilediği gibi at koşturmasına göz yumacaklar."
languages.original_text: "You kowtowed to the disloyal rabble. You believed their lies and showed them leniency. Next time the ship is attacked by cultists, that rabble will welcome them in with open arms and allow them to wreak whatever havoc they like, because they see you as a weak leader."

traits.locale_text: "Hainlerin laflarına kandınız. Yalanlarına inanıp onlara müsamaha gösterdiniz. O hainler, gemiye tekrar saldırdıklarında tarikatçılara kucak açacak. Sizi zayıf gördükleri için tarikatçıların dilediği gibi at koşturmasına göz yumacaklar."
